name: Snowfeather Scepter
description: A frost staff with glowing ice feathers and a snow crystal core, floating on a frozen pedestal in a glacial vault, emanating cold mist. It's said that a mere touch can turn enemies into ice sculptures.
description_ch: 一根帶有發光冰羽和雪晶核心的霜凍法杖，它漂浮在一座冰川寶庫內的冰凍石座上，散發著寒氣。據說只需碰觸，便可將敵人凍成雕像。
